data.description:
You’ve escaped the battle of the Great Pirate War, but the enemies are still after you. Get your cannon ready and defend your island!

** Aim and Destroy **
Use your cannonballs wisely and shoot accurately!

** Unlock More Levels **
Earn Keys to unlock new levels. Beware of new enemies! 

** Compete on Global Leaderboard**
Stay alive as long as you can to be on top of the leaderboard!

** Collect Treasures and Gold **
Grab all the loots, one they you’ll be the richest pirate in the world!

** Powerful Upgrades ** 
All the gold you loot will Improve your offense and unlock mighty Powers!

changelog.change_log:
Fix an issue that would sometimes impact framerate in Level 3. 
And other small performance improvements.
Fix a bug sometimes happening when using the Storm Power.

Fix a bug with Power buttons sometimes not appearing on second game.
Fix Parrots sometimes becoming invincible.

New feature: You can now sell collection items for coins! 

Bug fixes: 
- In game Power buttons were disappearing on second session for certain users 
- Offline sessions are now properly saved and restored 
- Minor graphic bugs in the Home 

This release also includes some graphic improvements. Enjoy!

New feature: You can now sell collection items for coins! 

Bug fixes: 
- In game Power buttons were disappearing on second session for certain users 
- Offline sessions are now properly saved and restored 
- Minor graphic bugs in the Home 

This release also includes some graphic improvements. Enjoy!
Fix a bug with rarer gems sometimes not appearing in the collection.
Bug fixes and improvements
Major bug fix.
Minor improvements and bug fixes
Fix a bug preventing from teleporting near the collection.

Newly Designed 2.0 Update!

All New Levels
Now enjoy 5 of all new beautiful islands with unexpected enemies

New Upgrades and Power
Get mighty with all new upgrades and power

Treasure Collection
Collect treasure and become the richest pirate in the world
